channel.title: Check bank?
channel.description: I need to code for checking players banks for an item, the code I am making searching your worn items and items in inventory, but I don't have a code to check bank so right now I have if PlayerWeapon == 4151, or playerhasitem(4151,1), now I need something like playersbankhas(4151,1) <- Just an example.

item.title: Check bank?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

public boolean playersbankhas(int id, int amount) { for (int i = 0; i < playerBankSize; i++) { if (bankItems[i] == id + 1 && bankItemsN[i] >= amount) { return true; } } return false; }
There, add that in your client class for playersbankhas.

Read full topic
